ARABIC: مَآ ءَامَنَتْ قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَٰهَآ أَفَهُمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: None of the cities which We destroyed before them had iman. So will they?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Not one habitation that We destroyed before them had believed. So how can they believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Not one township that We destroyed before them believed. Would they, then, believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The people of the town whom We had destroyed also had no faith. Will these people then believe in God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: There is not a township before them which did not believe which We have not destroyed; so will they believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Not one of the towns of those which We destroyed, believed before them; will they then believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: There did not believe before them any town which We destroyed, will they then believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Not one city that We destroyed before them believed; what then, will they not believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Not a township believed of those which We destroyed before them (though We sent them portents): would they then believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Before them, not one of the communities which We destroyed believed either. Will these believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Not a city before them which We destroyed believed; will they then believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: No town that We destroyed before them believed. Will these then have faith [if they are sent signs]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (As to those) before them, not one of the populations which We destroyed believed: will these believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Not one of the towns (populations), of those which We destroyed, believed before them (though We sent them signs), will they then believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Of the villages We destroyed, there was not one that believed. What, will they not believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: None of the towns We destroyed before them had believed. Will they, then, believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Not a [single] city which We destroyed believed before them, so will they believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:6] No town before them ever believed — meaning [none of] its inhabitants — of those that We destroyed, for the denial of the signs brought to them. Would they then believe? No.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then says: (Not a township) not a single population of a township (believed of those which We destroyed) when they disbelieved in the signs (before them) before your people: (would they then believe) would your people then believe in the signs? Nay, they will not.
